title: Channel Islands National Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved                   Volunteer for the park.               Join our Friends               Partners that help preserve the park.               Learn about planning projects in the park.         Â            NPS Centennial   Learn about the centennial events as the National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016.        Partners   Learn about the many partners that assist in preserving and protecting the Channel Islands.        Donate   Your donation will enhance the programs and activities that protect park resources and provide visitor services.              Volunteer   Join our dedicated group of volunteers.        Work With Us   Learn about jobs and volunteer opportunities within the park.        Doing Business With Us   Learn about conducting business activities with the park.              Planning   Learn about planning activities and projects within the park.        Support Your Park   Learn about our friends group and cooperating association.        Join Our Friends   The Channel Islands Park Foundation is the primary non-profit, philanthropic partner of the Channel Islands National Park.
